title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the AI Model Governance platform, including functional and non-functional requirements, stakeholder needs, compliance standards, ethical AI principles, data management, model lifecycle management, security and access controls, monitoring and logging, and integration with existing systems.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flows, and integration points, considering scalability, security, and performance requirements.

title: Develop Model Management Components
description: Implement the core functionality for managing AI models, including version control, deployment, and monitoring.

title: Implement Ethical AI Compliance
description: Develop mechanisms to ensure compliance with ethical AI principles, such as fairness, transparency, and accountability.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the AI Model Governance platform, including dashboards, model management tools, and compliance reporting.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Develop security mechanisms, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to ensure the platform's security and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up DevOps and CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish the DevOps infrastructure, including continuous integration, continuous deployment, and monitoring tools, to streamline the development and deployment processes.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the platform's quality and functionality.

title: Prepare Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials to support the platform's adoption and usage.

title: Deploy and Maintain the Platform
description: Deploy the AI Model Governance platform to production environments, monitor its performance, and implement necessary updates and maintenance procedures.
